channel.title: SadlyScape 2013 [Eco, Pvp, Stable, Free Mem]
channel.description:
[CENTER][COLOR="Red"][SIZE="4"]Hey Guys And Welcome to SadlyScape Advertisement![/SIZE][/COLOR] [B][I][SIZE=3]I am here to introduce you to an amazing server It's called Sadlyscape You can find it by clicking >[COLOR="red"]>[URL=http://"http://www.sadlyscape.net"]Here[/URL]<[/COLOR]< Take a look at some of the main features [/SIZE][/I][/B] Ok so lets start off with:
[B][SIZE=5][COLOR="black"]Information:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
Sort: Player VS Player & Player VS Envoriment Chooseable Xp Rate: [COLOR="Red"]Impossible, Insane, Hard, Medium, Easy[/COLOR]. - XP rate boosts your Chance for a drop, Example impossible gives 5% easy gives 1%. Items:[COLOR="Red"] 2008 Items + Virtus, Pernix, Torva, Chaotic Items + Dragon Claws.[/COLOR] CombatSystem: Reworked - Renamed Catogorised, 100% Working Specials, Ingame Pvp 100% Pve 85% - Combatsystem is for npc's to Players and npcs has the same system. Minigames: Pestcontrol, Barrows, Fight Caves. - More minigames is being planned already. ClueScrolls: Cluescroll system with 6 Diffrent cluescroll Easy, Med, Hard X2. - Cluescrolls rewards is diffrent deepending on what cluescroll. Economy: Rares that acctually is rares. Decent droprate. - Street prices is stable, Bosses: Bosses with decent droprate and a challanging task. - Bosses is diffrent easy to hard. godwars 100% Multiarea Skills: [COLOR="Red"]Every 20 Skills Working & 99% Functionaly[/COLOR] - Fishing, Woodcutting, Firemaking, Runecrafting 100% LootShare: 100% Lootshare with color and working group split. Payers: Working prayers Curses & Normal 100% - Curses is only for members. Systems for Envoriment: Vote, Loyalty, Pk Points, Killstreak, Lottery, Pkreward Statue Staff: [COLOR="Red"]Has a friendly range of staff that is always glad to take care and fix your problems[/COLOR] [SIZE="5"][COLOR="DarkRed"]THERE WILL BE MORE THINGS COMING[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SPOILER="Spoiler For Server Features"]Server features: - Ground Item Saving (Saves on ground for about 1 minute 40secounds) - Perfect switching (Same spots clicking) - Perfect potting (1,2,3,4 Pots working 100% + Overloads) - Perfect Combat delays (All Weapons and npcs has perfect combat delays) - Perfect magic system ( timers, immunity etc ) - Perfect Godwars - (Made sure every drop is correct.) - Market - Customized Shops Perfectly Stores for what class you ever are. - Perfect Hybriding Against Npcs And Players. - Items kept on death. - Exp Interface Enable or Disable - Equipment Bonus Interface 100% Working. - Cluescroll rewards from killing diffrent npcs - Membersarea for members - Get-job opinion to get jobs and earn extra loyalty points - Various of Training locations. - Resting - Restore run energy. [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Spoiler For Server Stability"]Server features: - Server specs: 2 Dual Core, 6GB Ram Memory. - Rewriten Combat System - Less Memory Usage - Daily Engine Updates. - Server loads at 600Ticks [/SPOILER] [SPOILER="Click spoiler for Boss, Training, Skilling Teleports."][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/300qtjk.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2a6t8vp.png[/img][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/i5x5as.png[/img][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/b56041.png[/img][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/33xdo40.png[/img][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2pte5pc.png[/img][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/hrerh5.png[/img][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1pf2f8.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Click spoiler for Quest Tab & Runecrafting & Gamble statue Interface"][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2hg7g8y.png[/img][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/k9urt3.png[/img][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/30xe9mo.jpg[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Click spoiler for Special Training Locations"][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/k9urt3.png[/img][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2vccqj7.png[/img][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/s5v6ew.png[/img][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/25575vm.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Spoiler for perfect switching"] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2dbnmva.gif[/img][/SPOILER] [/CENTER]

item.title: SadlyScape 2013 [Eco, Pvp, Stable, Free Mem]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

BBC fixed…

[hr]
[hr]
[hr]

[CENTER][COLOR=Red][SIZE=4]Hey GuysAnd Welcome to SadlyScape Advertisement![/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=3]I am here to introduce you to an amazing server
It’s called Sadlyscape You can find it by clicking >[COLOR=red]>Here<[/COLOR]<
Take a look at some of the main features
[/SIZE]
Ok so lets start off with:

[SIZE=5]Information:[/SIZE]

Sort: Player VS Player & Player VS Envoriment
Chooseable Xp Rate: [COLOR=Red]Impossible, Insane, Hard, Medium, Easy[/COLOR].

  • XP rate boosts your Chance for a drop, Example impossible gives 5% easy gives 1%.
    Items:[COLOR=Red] 2008 Items + Virtus, Pernix, Torva, Chaotic Items + Dragon Claws.[/COLOR]
    CombatSystem: Reworked - Renamed Catogorised, 100% Working Specials, Ingame Pvp 100% Pve 85%
  • Combatsystem is for npc’s to Players and npcs has the same system.
    Minigames: Pestcontrol, Barrows, Fight Caves.
  • More minigames is being planned already.
    ClueScrolls: Cluescroll system with 6 Diffrent cluescroll Easy, Med, Hard X2.
  • Cluescrolls rewards is diffrent deepending on what cluescroll.
    Economy: Rares that acctually is rares. Decent droprate.
  • Street prices is stable,
    Bosses: Bosses with decent droprate and a challanging task.
  • Bosses is diffrent easy to hard. godwars 100% Multiarea
    Skills: [COLOR=Red]Every 20 Skills Working & 99% Functionaly[/COLOR]
  • Fishing, Woodcutting, Firemaking, Runecrafting 100%
    LootShare: 100% Lootshare with color and working group split.
    Payers: Working prayers Curses & Normal 100%
  • Curses is only for members.
    Systems for Envoriment: Vote, Loyalty, Pk Points, Killstreak, Lottery, Pkreward Statue
    Staff: [COLOR=Red]Has a friendly range of staff that is always glad to take care and fix your problems[/COLOR]
    [SIZE=5][COLOR=Red]THERE WILL BE MORE THINGS COMING[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Server features:

  • Ground Item Saving (Saves on ground for about 1 minute 40secounds)
  • Perfect switching (Same spots clicking)
  • Perfect potting (1,2,3,4 Pots working 100% + Overloads)
  • Perfect Combat delays (All Weapons and npcs has perfect combat delays)
  • Perfect magic system ( timers, immunity etc )
  • Perfect Godwars - (Made sure every drop is correct.)
  • Market - Customized Shops Perfectly Stores for what class you ever are.
  • Perfect Hybriding Against Npcs And Players.
  • Items kept on death.
  • Exp Interface Enable or Disable
  • Equipment Bonus Interface 100% Working.
  • Cluescroll rewards from killing diffrent npcs
  • Membersarea for members
  • Get-job opinion to get jobs and earn extra loyalty points
  • Various of Training locations.
  • Resting - Restore run energy.

Server features:

  • Server specs: 2 Dual Core, 6GB Ram Memory.
  • Rewriten Combat System - Less Memory Usage
  • Daily Engine Updates.
  • Server loads at 600Ticks


[/CENTER]

Read full topic
